name: Manus-Bond 67-A
description: Manus-Bond 67-A offers excellent adhesion to many materials including wallboard, wood, metals, cement, brick, glass and tile. May be used to fill joints and cracks between interior wall surfaces as well as door and window buck perimeters. 67-A is quality formulated to be non-discoloring, mildew resistant and stays flexible to provide a long-lasting resilient seal with minimal shrinkage. Clean-up is quick and easy with soap and water.
